Hollow Knight
Stow Fear
Fear Eater
Tombstones
Clear the Horror Effect

The Hollow Knight is an oddity, a beast without rage. A warrior without recompense, or proper burial. He fights best in the front line, where he is needed most. Charge allows him to return to the frontline if he is sent back, and his Fear Eater can reduce stress from his allies, if only to bear it himself. Even in death, he will serve to the last breath.

The Hollow Knight doesn't need to worry about repairing his armor in vital spots, given his crystalline makeup. Instead, he focuses on forging his plate as heavily as he can bear it, as to halt the advances of his foes.

The Hollow Knight is a fickle sort at camp. Few skills benefit anyone, and he tends to mimic the others with basic skills. His talents are best spent in the heat of combat, where he finds himself yearning to.
Dead Again
More Bodies To Tend To

A wayfaring knight passed on in the Farmstead, but rose among the corpses of those within the Comet's hateful light. His flesh turned crystalline, and his body reborn, he stands ready to complete the task he was sent for.
More knights fall victim to the Comet. More rise, and with them, more defectors to aide our cause.
There we go... Clean and ready to bear the banner.
Don't act so shocked. You've seen worse.
There we are, good as new...
I do not require sleep. Rest, friends...
There are few moments in life where one needs to truly fear. Ask yourself - Is this one?
My liege's court jester once told me this fascinating story...
Here, friend, hold my hand. Things are not as uncertain this way, are they?
I've tended to many battlefield wounds. This is just another on the list.
Hold, friend. Let me sort these injuries.
Calm. The faster your heart beats, the more blood you lose.
N-No! NOOO!
Stay BACK! I DON'T WANT TO DIE AGAIN!
I-I've faced death already! Leave me alone!
*Long scream* They want my SOUL!
As with my liege, as with my queen, as with my home. You're all conspirators to my end.
I am a loose end you wish to tie, is it? Come on, then. FACE ME!
You are foolish to consider me blind to your attempts to undermine my life.
In my reflections, I can see your hateful endeavors.
You want me DEAD! I KNOW IT! FACE ME!
The Lash is all I need for these broken bones!
Cherish me, o' goddesses of pain! I COME FOR YOU!
More hits! MORE HITS! PLEEEAAASE!
I feel alive! Alive I say!
Comrades! Join me in a baptism of BLOOD! OUR BLOOD!
Ignorant bags of errant flesh, all of you.
I must improve my lustre! Surrender your whetstones!
I am a terrible, terrible thing... Don't look, I don't want you seeing what I've become.
M-My lady?! Is that you?! Have you returned to my arms?!
I've brushed with death enough times to know him on a first name basis. This is just another time I can slap his hand.
Kahaha! How cute.
Form ranks! Tonight, we dine in the tavern, or in HELL!
Behind me! I will lead us to GLORY!
Look at how it staggered, watch its footwork. We can use that.
I love this part of my occupation.
KREYAAAAAAAGH!
MY CRYSTALS SCREAM, MY VEINS ARE ON FIRE! SURRENDER YOUR SOULS, BEASTS OF THE DARK!
*His crystals begin regrowing rapidly..!*
Fah, I've been faced with worse.
That look in your eyes reassures me, friend.
My father would be proud of me.
THEY DO NOT QUIVER IN UNDULATION! THEY QUIVER IN FEAR!
To think that THIS was the cosmic threat they spoke of! Kahaha!
Observe its stagger.
Its legs are weak. Sweep them.
Take these crystals, they burn with my RAGE!
MY FURY IS OF A THOUSAND STARS! WE WILL DESTROY THEM ALL! WE WILL EAT THEIR SOULS!
My limbs obey me once more.
Fahaha... I can feel my wounds sealing. Time itself bleeds out in my stead.
G-Gah! Look at those TEETH!
No! No no no! NOOO!
(sob) Please..! Make it STOOOP!
You're conspiring to kill me now, I can SEE it!
Yes! MORE! PLEASE!
Look at you, bumbling about in the dark. Kahaha!
Gaze upon me! NOW! I DEMAND YOU HONOR MY GLORY!
We aren't going to make it, we're... done.
M-My queen! There you are! Come, quick, before the King returns..! Hahahaaah!
NIGHTSOIL! THIS IS ALL NIGHTSOIL! I-I WANT TO LIVE, DAMN YOU, LIVE!
Trap. Right there. I can see it. Don't think I'm an idiot.
More pain, more PAIN!
Ah, my love, my queen... Let me embrace you.
Where are you going, my queen, my muse? Come back..!
Just let me die already.
Just let me DIE!
Come on..! I want to DIE!
I am useless here, no one will benefit from my presence.
Out of my way, let me die.
Just... make it end already.
I must have my title known EVERYWHERE! PRAISE TO ME!
Let my lustre be known!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
YOU can handle this. I'M going to appreciate my crystals.
Fahaha! I'll say I killed this one, don't worry.
N-No! Please no!
I-I-I don't want to get close!
NOOOO!
Only an idiot would fall for these tricks. I'm sitting this out.
You do not control me.
I can see right through your musings to kill me.
Fah! Such idiocy is the path to a mundane existence.
Idiot.
I could have planned that better. Try again.
What use would it be..? We're all going to die.
Wh-What?! My PANTS?! Yes, my queen! I shall do away with my trousers at once! (He begins trying to yank off his belt).
No, THIS is a proper combat action. YOUR'S would get me murdered.
Please hit me please hit me please hit me...
Let me show you how a REAL knight swings his weight, idiots.
GLORY TO MEEE!
Please, just let me DIE already..! *sob* Please...
This way to the stockroom, my queen. We shall dance!
Th-The shadows..! They're alive, watching us... Sh-Shhh!!!
I'm not sleeping, I'll keep my eyes open for your idiot plans.
The fire feels so good on my hands, why can't I reach into the blazes again..?
You couldn't cook a meal if your lives depended on it.
The bags are MINE tonight! You lot get the dirt. I deserve this rest.
M-My queen, why have you entered my chambers..? What is that..? ...M-My queen..?
YES! MORE TO ME!
*sob* I just... I... *sob*
Not my chestplate, my lady..! W-What if he sees us..?
MMMH! That felt splendid...
I have to do it myself... *sob* ...I guess.
Avocado, my lady! Avocado! The word of safety is Avocado!
Turn our BACKS?! Are you MAD?!
Leave without me. I want to die here.
BATHE IN OUR PAIN, COWARDS!
M-My lady... Do not leave just yet. Please, cuddle with me a while longer?
G-Gaaah..! Help me, please! PLEASE!
How could it see through my movements?! WHO SET ME TO THIS?!
Come on, one of you take these blows for me! I grow tired of seeing my lustre tarnished!
A-Aaaaah..!~
I won't say it again, my queen. I promise..!
T-They're too fast..!
YOU CONSPIRE WITH THEM! I KNOW IT!
(Under his breath) "...now just swing back..."
M-My love... What's wrong..? Does he know?
DO NOT TAKE MY GLORY!
Fah! You call that a cleave? You must be dreaming.
M-My lord, she is just a lady! She has done no wrong!
They shift! THEY SHIFT! What errant flesh are they?! What eldritch deity commands them?!
Oh,c come ON! You expect me to believe that was accidental?
Swing harder, that'll SURELY make your lazy eye correct itself. Idiot.
Are you so sure that you're cut out for this? Maybe a great knight such as I could take your place for this glorious task?
Restrain yourself my lord! What woes have invoked her to be so bloodied like this..?!
It's not enough! P-Please, let's just..! RUN!
Method acting at its finest.
NOOO!!! NOT THEM, PLEASE!
Fahaha! That's what you get.
M-My lady... Hush, he can't hurt you anymore.
I-It's over for us!
Oh come, are you supposed to tell me that was an accident?!
Yes my lord..! Leave her be..! Hit ME instead..!
N-No! No, please stay..! Don't... Don't run!
You would flank me? HAH! Idiot.
Leave me to rot? YES! PLEASE!
No you don't, GET BACK HERE!
My love... P-Please don't go...
It's POISON! Poison I say!
I need to suffer! BLEED, BURN AND BOIL!
No... I-I... *sob* I need to die.
My lady... I-I cannot accept this. It is his ring...
You think I'd just LET you touch me?! You must be fooling yourself. Traitor.
I'm enjoying this. Heal someone else.
I need to repent, pay for my sins. *sniffle*
I can almost hear her voice! She's singing! AHAHAHA!
No. I'm not going to let you 'empower' me. How do I know you won't stab me when I turn?
I'm enjoying this. Embolden someone else.
It won't help any... It... *sigh* Just let me die already.
N-Not at the table, my lady... Shhh..!
A-Aah! Keep it away..! You scared me.
A-Aah! keep it away..! You scared me.
Wh-What?! What is that?!
No.
Keep your mitts off me, I trusted one person in my life, and she betrayed my love.
Keep your disgusting hands away from me.
I need to revel in this pain.
My recompense is nigh! Let me enjoy this!
Make yourself useful and pass the salt. My few pieces of flesh bleed.
HAH! Try again next night, moron.
Idiot.
Moron.
Glory is not wrought from being babied by some idiot.
How about you polish my crystals instead?
Shine my mail instead.
Death's already knocking for me.
Don't come close to me... I'm... *sob*... a monster.
Drive your blade into me instead...
M-My lady..! Do not reach below my belt, we're in public..!
M-My love... Why are you so angry with me..?
Please, my lady, just talk to me. No trists, no flings. Just words.
*He remains entirely quiet*
*Not a peep leaves his armor*
*He just breathes, heavily*
Pain... Pain... PAIN PAIN PAIN PAIN!
Let me BLEED damn you!
If you mend me, I'll just open the wound again.
You must sniff the hides of pigs to think that'd work.
You boot licking scum, hands off.
I'm not going near. You smell of nightsoil.
My lady..? Are you okay?
Rejecting your advances was the only way, my love.
Poison. I see it. I was poisoned once before.
I can clearly see the poison within the food.
Hunger is life, life is hunger... *He repeats it over and over.*
I will starve. Let me starve.
Take my portions.
Just... let me mourn.
My lord, I can see the specks. You've poisoned my food. ...So you know. Now you know what I must do.
Put that down!
You moron! LEARN!
LEAVE HER ALONE, YOU DESPOTIC ABUSER OF WIVES! AWAY WITH YOU!
Fahaha! Stagger!
Rrraaaaah!
Did they ever stand a chance?
One more nick on this battered blade. One more notch in my armor.
Shhh... No more screaming from you, beast.
...I was wrong to indulge her lust, but... I couldn't resist...
I can see her before me, my trists... My love. Bloodied, beaten. The king bearing her crown, dented... Leave her alone..!
The allure of her perfume, it returns to my nose...
My love. I'm coming home.
Don't let my loss undermine our efforts..! Press on without me..!
Cavaleiro Vazio

O Cavaleiro Vazio é uma peculiar criatura, uma besta sem odio. Um guerreiro que partiu sem honra ou um enterro digno. Ele luta na linha de frente. onde é mais necessario. "Avanço" o ajuda a voltar a linha de frente quando é mandado para trás, e seu "Devorador de Medo" pode reduzir o estresse de seus aliados, apenas para suportar o mesmo fardo. Mesmo que morto, ele te servira até o ultimo suspiro.

O Cavaleiro Vazio não precisa se preocupar em consertar sua armadura em pontos vitais, graças a sua estrutura cristalina. Em vez disso, ele se preocupa em fazer a armadura mais pesado possivel, para tentar impedir oo avanço de seus inimigos.

Quando em repouso, as funcionalidades do Cavaleiro Vazio são bem variadas. Algumas habilidades podem beneficiar qualquer um, e tambem, ele tende a tentar copiar as habilidades dos outros. Seus talentos são mais bem gastos no calor da batalha, pela qual ele anseia tanto.
Morto mais uma vez
Mais corpos para tomar conta

O Cavaleiro errante encontrou sua morte perto de uma vazenda em uma vila, porém, se levantou entre os outros cadaveres, movidos pela abominavel luz de um cometa. Sua carne fi transformada em cristal, e seu corpo foi renascido, agora, ele está pronto para qualquer tarefa que recebera.
Outros cavaleiros cairam nas mãos da luz do cometa. Outros subiram de suas covas, e com eles, outros defensores para ajudar em nossa causa.
Aí vamos nós... Limpo e pronto para carregar a bandeira.
Não haja como se estivesse assustado, você já viu bem pior.
Aqui estamos nós, bons como se fossemos novos...
Eu não necessito de dormir. Descansem, amigos...
Existem poucos momentos quando precisamos de medo. Pergunte a si mesmo - Esse é um deles?
Meu soberano uma vez me contou essa história fascinante...
Aqui, amigos, segurem minha mão. Coisas serão incertas nesse caminhos, não serão?
Eu já sofri muitas feridas no campo de batalha. Essa é apenas outra para minha lista.
Espere, amigo. Me deixe cuidar dessa ferida.
Se acalme. Quanto mais rápido seu coração bater, mais sangue você perderá.
N-não! NÂOOOOOOOO!
SE AFASTE! EU NÃO QUERO MORRER MAIS UMA VEZ!
E-eu já me encontrei com a morte uma vez! Me deixe em paz!
*Longo grito de agonia* Eles querem minha ALMA!
Assim como meu soberano, assim como minha rainha, assim como minha terra. Vocês todos estão conspirando para minha morte.
Eu sou o louco que você destruir, não sou? Então venha! ME ENCARE!
Vocês são tolos em imaginar que eu não reconheço as tentativas suas de acabar comigo.
Em minhas reflexões, consigo ver seus atos de ódio.
Vocês me querem morto! EU SEI!
Um chicote é tudo que você precisa para lidar com esses ossos quebrados!
Me abraçe, ó deusa da dor! EU VIM POR VOCÊ!
Me bata mais! ME BATA MAIS! MAAAAAAAIS!
Eu me sinto tão vivo. Vivo!
Meus colegas. Se juntem ao batismo de SANGUE! NOSSO SANGUE!
Sacos ignorantes de carnes, todos vocês.
Eu devo melhorar meu brilho. Se rendam meras pedras para afiar espadas!
Eu sou uma criatura terrivel, abominavel... Não me olhe, eu não quero que você veja o que eu me tornei.
M-minha dama? É você? Eu finalmente voltei à seus braços!
Eu me encontrei com a morte tantas vezes que já o conheço como a palma da minha mão. Essa será apenas mais uma vez onde cairei em suas garras.
KaHaHa. Mais que adoravel
Forme essas linhas! Hoje jantaremos no bar, ou NO INFERNO!
Sigam-me! Minha liderança nos levara a vitória!
Veja como ele cambaleou, observe como ele anda. Nós podemos usar isso.
Eu amo essa parte do meu trabalho.
HIIIAAAAAHHHHHH!
MEUS CRISTAIS GRITAM! MINHAS VEIAS ESTÃO EM CHAMAS! SE RENDAM, CRIATURAS DA ESCURIDÃO!
*Seus cristais começam a crescer rapidamente..!*
Hs, eu já encontrei pior.
Esse olhar em seus olhos me acalma, meu amigo.
Meu pai estaria orgulhoso de mim.
ELES NÃO ESTREMECEM EM MURMURIOS! ELES ESTREMECEM EM MEDO!
E pensar que esse era a ameaça sombria que eles falavam! KaHaHa!
Observe o quanto ele está desbalanciado.
Suas pernas estão fracas. Destrua elas.
Levem esses cristais, eles brilham com meu ÓDIO!
EU TENHO A FÚRIA DE MIL ESTRELAS! NÓS IREMOS DESTRUI-LOS! NÓS COMEREMOS SUAS ALMAS!
Meus membros mais uma vez me obadecem.
Fahaha... Eu posso sentir minhas feridas se fechando. O tempo sangra em meu lugar.
G-Gah! Olhe todos aqueles DENTES!
Não! Não! Não! NÃOOOOOO!
(choro) Por favor! Faça PARAAAAAR!
Você está conspirando contra mim, eu sei sobre isso!
Sim! MAIS! POR FAVOR!
Olhe para você, tropeçando no escuro. Kahaha!
Se ajoelhe para mim! AGORA! EU DEMANDO QUE VOCÊ HONRE MINHA GLÓRIA!
Nós não iremos conseguir, nós estamos... acabados.
M-minha rainha! Aí está você! Venha, rápido, antes que o rei chegue...! Hahahaaah!
MAS QUE MERDA! TUDO ISSO É UMA MERDA! E-EU QUERO VIVER, VÁ SE FERRAR, QUERO VIVER!
Uma armadilha. Logo ali. Eu consigo ver. Não me chame de idiota.
Mais dor, mais DOR!
Ah, meu amor, minha rainha... Deixe-me te abraçar.
Onde você está indo, minha rainha, minha deusa? Volte..!
Só me deixe morrer de uma vez.
Só me deixe MORRER!
Vamos... EU quero MORRER!
Eu sou um inutil aqui, ninguem se beneficiara de minha prasença.
Sáia de meu caminho, eu quero morrer.
Só.... Faça acabar de uma vez.
Eu devo ser conhecido em TODA PARTE! ME DE SEU LOUVOR!
Deixe meu brilho ser conhecido!
Beije o chão, eu acabei de andar nele, desgraçados!
Beije o chão, eu acabei de andar nele, desgraçados!
Você consegue aguentar isso. Eu beijarei meus cristais.
Fahaha! Eu direi que você matou esse, não se preocupe.
N-Não! Por favor NÃO!
E-Eu não quero chegar mais perto!
NÃÃÃÃÃÕ!
Apenas um idiota cairia nesses truques. Estou fora.
Você não vai me controlar.
Eu posso ver através de você, você deseja minha morte.
Fah! O quão idiota é o caminho para a existencia mundana.
Imbecil.
Eu poderia ter planejado melhor. Tente mais uma vez.
Qual uso isso teria..? Nõs vamos todos morrer.
O-Oque?! Minhas calças?! Sim, minha rainha! Eu retirarei minhas calças de uma vez só! (Tenta puxar seu cinto).
Não, é assim que se luta direito. Se eu lutasse do SEU jeiro, eu seria assassinado.
Por favor me bata por favor me bata por favor me bata...
Me deixe mostrar como um VERDADEIRO cavaleiro resolve um problema, imbecis.
GLORIA PARA MIIIIM!
Por favor, só me deixe morrer de uma vez! *choro* Por favor...
Se formos por aí, chegaremos a despensa, minha rainha. Vamos dançar!
A-As sombras..! Elas estão VIVAS, estão nos vigiando... Sh-Shhh!!!
Eu não estou dormindo, deixarei meus olhos bem abertos para vigiar esses seus planos idiotas.
O fogo me faz sentir tão bem, por que não podemos tocar nas chamas de novo..?
Você não conseguiria nem fritar um ovo mesmo se sua vida dependesse disso.
Essas recompensas serão minhas! Vocês terão apenas sujeira. Eu mereço o resto.
...*choro*
M-Minha rainha, por que minha dama veio a meus aposentos..? O que é isso..? ...M-Minha rainha..?
SIM! MAIS PARA MIM!
*choro* Eu apenas... Eu... *choro*
Não retire meu peitoral, minha dama..! E-E se eles nos acharem..?
MMMH! Isso foi um sentimento explêndido...
Eu terei que fazer por mim mesmo... *choro* ...Eu acho.
Abacate, minha dama! Abacate! A palavra de segurança é Abacate!
Nos dar as COSTAS?! Você está LOUCO?!
Me deixem. Eu quero morrer aqui.
SE LAVEM EM NOSSA DOR, COVARDES!
Mi-Minha dama... Não vá tão cedo. Por favor, deite comigo um pouco mais?
G-Gaaah..! Me ajude, por favor! POR FAVOR!
Como pode prever meus movimentos?! QUEM ME COLOCOU NESSE LUGAR?!
Vamos lá, ataquem por mim dessa vez! Eu não quero sujar o lustre da minha armadura!
A-Aaaaah..!~
Eu não direi de novo, minha rainha. Eu prometo..!
E-Eles são rápidos de mais..!
VOCÊ CONSPIRA JUNTO DELES! EU SEI!
(Resmungando baixo e lentamente) "...agora ataque de volta..."
M-Meu amor... O que aconteceu..? Ele descobriu?
NÃO TIRE A MINHA GLÓRIA!
Fah! Você chama isso de soco? Você deve estar delirando.
Meu senhor, ela é apenas uma dama! Ela não fez nada de errado!
Eles mudaram! ELES ESTÃO MUDANDO! Que tipo de resto de carne são esses?!Que dinindade amaldiçoada ps comanda?!
Está brincando? Acha que eu vou acreditar que aquilo foi um acidente?
Bata mais forte, porque CONCERTEZA isso vai concertar sua vesguice. Imbecil.
Tem certeza de que você é bom para isso? Pode o grande Cavaleiro na minha pessoa assumir este nobre fardo?
Tem misericórdia, meu senhor! O que aconteceu com ela, ela está coberta de sangue..?!
Não é o suficiente! Por favor, vamos apenas,..! VAMOS FUGIR!
E a atuação em seu jogo, devo admitir, é excelente.
NÃÃÃÃO!!! NÃO ELES, POR FAVOR!
Fahaha! Você mereceu.
M-Minha senhora, se acalme, ele não pode mais te machucar.
A-Acabou para nós!
oh, serio? Você quer me dizer que isso foi um acidente?!
Sim, meu senhor! Deixa ela em paz ..! Me puna no lugar dela..!
N-Não! Não, fiquem comigo..! Não... Não fujam!
Você ia me colocar de lado? HAH! Idiota.
Me deixar para apodrecer? SIM! POR FAVOR!
Não você não irá, VOLTE AQUI!
Meu amor... N-Não me deixe...
Isso é veneno! VENENO!
Eu preciso sofrer! SANGRAR, QUEIMAR, APODRECER!
Não... E-Eu... *choro* Eu preciso morrer.
Minha dama... E-Eu não posso aceitar isso. Isso é o anel dele...
Você pensa que eu deixaria você ME TOCAR?! Você está delirando. Traidor.
Eu estou gostando disse. Cure outra pessoa.
Preciso me arrepender, pagar pelos meus pecados. *choro lento*
Eu consigo ouvir a voz dela! Ela está cantando! AHAHAHA!
Não. Eu não vou deixar você "me fortalecer". E se você me matar assim que eu virar as costas?
Eu estou adorando isso. Encoraje qualquer outra pessoa.
Isso não ajuda ninguém —... É ... *suspiro* Só me deixe morrer.
N-Não na mesa, minha dama... Shhh..!
A-Aah! Fique longe..! Você está me assustando.
A-Aah! Fique longe..! Você me assustou.
O-Oque é isso?! O que é isso?!
Não.
Mantenha suas pequenas mãos para si. Confiei em apenas uma pessoa na minha vida e ela traiu meu amor.
Deixe essas suas mãos nojentas longe de mim.
Eu tenho que me divertir com essa dor.
Minha recompensa está tão proxima! Só me deixe aproveitar!
Prove sua utilidade e me passe o sal. A pouca carne em mim já está sangrando novamente.
HAH! Tente outra vez, débil mental.
Idiota.
Cretino.
Eu não terei glória se alguns idiotas ficarem cuidando de mim.
E se eu ficar aqui polindo meus cristais?
[Seria melhor se eu polisse minha armadura.
DA morte já está batendo na minha porta.
Não chegue perto de mim... Eu sou... *choto*... um monstro.
Me esfaqueie com sua lâmina no lugar disso...
Mi-Minha dama..! Não vá para baixo do meu cinto, nós estamos em publico..!
M-meu amor... Por que está tão irritada comigo..?
Por favor, minha dama, só fale comigo. Sem conforto, sem afeto. Apenas palavras.
*Ele se mantem completamente queieto*
*Nenhum som pode ser ouvido*
*Ele apenas respira pesado*
Dor... Dor... DOR DOR DOR DOR!
Deixe me SANGRAR seu desgraçado!
Se você tentar me curar, eu vou apenas me ferir denovo
Você deve ter comido os "restos" dos porcos para pensar que isso iria funcionar.
Mãos à obra, desgraçados.
Não vou chegar perto de você. Você cheira como esterco.
Minha dama..? Você está bem?
Rejeitar seu namoro foi a unica saída, meu amor.
Veneno. Estou vendo. Já fui envenenado uma vez.
Consigo claramente ver veneno no meio da comida.
A fome é a vida, viver é ter fome... *Ele repete isso de novo e de novo.*
Eu morreirei de fome. Me deixem morrer de fome.
Peguem minha comida.
Só me deixe... Deixe-me entristecer.
Milord, vejo o veneno na comida. ... Então você sabe de tudo. Você sabe o que tenho que fazer.
Coloque isso no chão!
Seu imbecil! APRENDA!
ME DEIXE EM PAZ, SEU ABUSADOR DE ESPOSAS! VÁ EMBORA!
Fahaha! Continuem tropeçando!
Rrraaaaah!
Eles tiveram alguma chance?
Mais um corte na espada. Mais um arranhão na minha armadura.
Shhh... Pare de gritar, abominação.
...Eu estava errado em cair n amor dela, mas... Não consegui resistir...
Consigo ve-la m=em minha frente, minha alegira... Meu amor. Ensanguentada, espancada. O rei, segurando sua coroa, destruída... Deixe a em paz..!
A fragrância de seu perfume, faz cócegas no meu nariz...
Meu amor. Estou voltando pra casa.
Não deixe que minha perda acabe com nossos esforços..! Continue sem mim..!

The Hollow Knight is an oddity, a beast without rage. A warrior without recompense, or proper burial. He fights best in the front line, where he is needed most. Charge allows him to return to the frontline if he is sent back, and his Fear Eater can reduce stress from his allies, if only to bear it himself. Even in death, he will serve to the last breath.

The Hollow Knight doesn't need to worry about repairing his armor in vital spots, given his crystalline makeup. Instead, he focuses on forging his plate as heavily as he can bear it, as to halt the advances of his foes.

The Hollow Knight is a fickle sort at camp. Few skills benefit anyone, and he tends to mimic the others with basic skills. His talents are best spent in the heat of combat, where he finds himself yearning to.
Dead Again
More Bodies To Tend To

A wayfaring knight passed on in the Farmstead, but rose among the corpses of those within the Comet's hateful light. His flesh turned crystalline, and his body reborn, he stands ready to complete the task he was sent for.
More knights fall victim to the Comet. More rise, and with them, more defectors to aide our cause.
There we go... Clean and ready to bear the banner.
Don't act so shocked. You've seen worse.
There we are, good as new...
I do not require sleep. Rest, friends...
There are few moments in life where one needs to truly fear. Ask yourself - Is this one?
My liege's court jester once told me this fascinating story...
Here, friend, hold my hand. Things are not as uncertain this way, are they?
I've tended to many battlefield wounds. This is just another on the list.
Hold, friend. Let me sort these injuries.
Calm. The faster your heart beats, the more blood you lose.
N-No! NOOO!
Stay BACK! I DON'T WANT TO DIE AGAIN!
I-I've faced death already! Leave me alone!
*Long scream* They want my SOUL!
As with my liege, as with my queen, as with my home. You're all conspirators to my end.
I am a loose end you wish to tie, is it? Come on, then. FACE ME!
You are foolish to consider me blind to your attempts to undermine my life.
In my reflections, I can see your hateful endeavors.
You want me DEAD! I KNOW IT! FACE ME!
The Lash is all I need for these broken bones!
Cherish me, o' goddesses of pain! I COME FOR YOU!
More hits! MORE HITS! PLEEEAAASE!
I feel alive! Alive I say!
Comrades! Join me in a baptism of BLOOD! OUR BLOOD!
Ignorant bags of errant flesh, all of you.
I must improve my lustre! Surrender your whetstones!
I am a terrible, terrible thing... Don't look, I don't want you seeing what I've become.
M-My lady?! Is that you?! Have you returned to my arms?!
I've brushed with death enough times to know him on a first name basis. This is just another time I can slap his hand.
Kahaha! How cute.
Form ranks! Tonight, we dine in the tavern, or in HELL!
Behind me! I will lead us to GLORY!
Look at how it staggered, watch its footwork. We can use that.
I love this part of my occupation.
KREYAAAAAAAGH!
MY CRYSTALS SCREAM, MY VEINS ARE ON FIRE! SURRENDER YOUR SOULS, BEASTS OF THE DARK!
*His crystals begin regrowing rapidly..!*
Fah, I've been faced with worse.
That look in your eyes reassures me, friend.
My father would be proud of me.
THEY DO NOT QUIVER IN UNDULATION! THEY QUIVER IN FEAR!
To think that THIS was the cosmic threat they spoke of! Kahaha!
Observe its stagger.
Its legs are weak. Sweep them.
Take these crystals, they burn with my RAGE!
MY FURY IS OF A THOUSAND STARS! WE WILL DESTROY THEM ALL! WE WILL EAT THEIR SOULS!
My limbs obey me once more.
Fahaha... I can feel my wounds sealing. Time itself bleeds out in my stead.
G-Gah! Look at those TEETH!
No! No no no! NOOO!
(sob) Please..! Make it STOOOP!
You're conspiring to kill me now, I can SEE it!
Yes! MORE! PLEASE!
Look at you, bumbling about in the dark. Kahaha!
Gaze upon me! NOW! I DEMAND YOU HONOR MY GLORY!
We aren't going to make it, we're... done.
M-My queen! There you are! Come, quick, before the King returns..! Hahahaaah!
NIGHTSOIL! THIS IS ALL NIGHTSOIL! I-I WANT TO LIVE, DAMN YOU, LIVE!
Trap. Right there. I can see it. Don't think I'm an idiot.
More pain, more PAIN!
Ah, my love, my queen... Let me embrace you.
Where are you going, my queen, my muse? Come back..!
Just let me die already.
Just let me DIE!
Come on..! I want to DIE!
I am useless here, no one will benefit from my presence.
Out of my way, let me die.
Just... make it end already.
I must have my title known EVERYWHERE! PRAISE TO ME!
Let my lustre be known!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
YOU can handle this. I'M going to appreciate my crystals.
Fahaha! I'll say I killed this one, don't worry.
N-No! Please no!
I-I-I don't want to get close!
NOOOO!
Only an idiot would fall for these tricks. I'm sitting this out.
You do not control me.
I can see right through your musings to kill me.
Fah! Such idiocy is the path to a mundane existence.
Idiot.
I could have planned that better. Try again.
What use would it be..? We're all going to die.
Wh-What?! My PANTS?! Yes, my queen! I shall do away with my trousers at once! (He begins trying to yank off his belt).
No, THIS is a proper combat action. YOUR'S would get me murdered.
Please hit me please hit me please hit me...
Let me show you how a REAL knight swings his weight, idiots.
GLORY TO MEEE!
Please, just let me DIE already..! *sob* Please...
This way to the stockroom, my queen. We shall dance!
Th-The shadows..! They're alive, watching us... Sh-Shhh!!!
I'm not sleeping, I'll keep my eyes open for your idiot plans.
The fire feels so good on my hands, why can't I reach into the blazes again..?
You couldn't cook a meal if your lives depended on it.
The bags are MINE tonight! You lot get the dirt. I deserve this rest.
M-My queen, why have you entered my chambers..? What is that..? ...M-My queen..?
YES! MORE TO ME!
*sob* I just... I... *sob*
Not my chestplate, my lady..! W-What if he sees us..?
MMMH! That felt splendid...
I have to do it myself... *sob* ...I guess.
Avocado, my lady! Avocado! The word of safety is Avocado!
Turn our BACKS?! Are you MAD?!
Leave without me. I want to die here.
BATHE IN OUR PAIN, COWARDS!
M-My lady... Do not leave just yet. Please, cuddle with me a while longer?
G-Gaaah..! Help me, please! PLEASE!
How could it see through my movements?! WHO SET ME TO THIS?!
Come on, one of you take these blows for me! I grow tired of seeing my lustre tarnished!
A-Aaaaah..!~
I won't say it again, my queen. I promise..!
T-They're too fast..!
YOU CONSPIRE WITH THEM! I KNOW IT!
(Under his breath) "...now just swing back..."
M-My love... What's wrong..? Does he know?
DO NOT TAKE MY GLORY!
Fah! You call that a cleave? You must be dreaming.
M-My lord, she is just a lady! She has done no wrong!
They shift! THEY SHIFT! What errant flesh are they?! What eldritch deity commands them?!
Oh,c come ON! You expect me to believe that was accidental?
Swing harder, that'll SURELY make your lazy eye correct itself. Idiot.
Are you so sure that you're cut out for this? Maybe a great knight such as I could take your place for this glorious task?
Restrain yourself my lord! What woes have invoked her to be so bloodied like this..?!
It's not enough! P-Please, let's just..! RUN!
Method acting at its finest.
NOOO!!! NOT THEM, PLEASE!
Fahaha! That's what you get.
M-My lady... Hush, he can't hurt you anymore.
I-It's over for us!
Oh come, are you supposed to tell me that was an accident?!
Yes my lord..! Leave her be..! Hit ME instead..!
N-No! No, please stay..! Don't... Don't run!
You would flank me? HAH! Idiot.
Leave me to rot? YES! PLEASE!
No you don't, GET BACK HERE!
My love... P-Please don't go...
It's POISON! Poison I say!
I need to suffer! BLEED, BURN AND BOIL!
No... I-I... *sob* I need to die.
My lady... I-I cannot accept this. It is his ring...
You think I'd just LET you touch me?! You must be fooling yourself. Traitor.
I'm enjoying this. Heal someone else.
I need to repent, pay for my sins. *sniffle*
I can almost hear her voice! She's singing! AHAHAHA!
No. I'm not going to let you 'empower' me. How do I know you won't stab me when I turn?
I'm enjoying this. Embolden someone else.
It won't help any... It... *sigh* Just let me die already.
N-Not at the table, my lady... Shhh..!
A-Aah! Keep it away..! You scared me.
A-Aah! keep it away..! You scared me.
Wh-What?! What is that?!
No.
Keep your mitts off me, I trusted one person in my life, and she betrayed my love.
Keep your disgusting hands away from me.
I need to revel in this pain.
My recompense is nigh! Let me enjoy this!
Make yourself useful and pass the salt. My few pieces of flesh bleed.
HAH! Try again next night, moron.
Idiot.
Moron.
Glory is not wrought from being babied by some idiot.
How about you polish my crystals instead?
Shine my mail instead.
Death's already knocking for me.
Don't come close to me... I'm... *sob*... a monster.
Drive your blade into me instead...
M-My lady..! Do not reach below my belt, we're in public..!
M-My love... Why are you so angry with me..?
Please, my lady, just talk to me. No trists, no flings. Just words.
*He remains entirely quiet*
*Not a peep leaves his armor*
*He just breathes, heavily*
Pain... Pain... PAIN PAIN PAIN PAIN!
Let me BLEED damn you!
If you mend me, I'll just open the wound again.
You must sniff the hides of pigs to think that'd work.
You boot licking scum, hands off.
I'm not going near. You smell of nightsoil.
My lady..? Are you okay?
Rejecting your advances was the only way, my love.
Poison. I see it. I was poisoned once before.
I can clearly see the poison within the food.
Hunger is life, life is hunger... *He repeats it over and over.*
I will starve. Let me starve.
Take my portions.
Just... let me mourn.
My lord, I can see the specks. You've poisoned my food. ...So you know. Now you know what I must do.
Put that down!
You moron! LEARN!
LEAVE HER ALONE, YOU DESPOTIC ABUSER OF WIVES! AWAY WITH YOU!
...I was wrong to indulge her lust, but... I couldn't resist...
I can see her before me, my trists... My love. Bloodied, beaten. The king bearing her crown, dented... Leave her alone..!
The allure of her perfume, it returns to my nose...
My love. I'm coming home.
Don't let my loss undermine our efforts..! Press on without me..!

More knights fall victim to the Comet. More rise, and with them, more defectors to aide our cause.
There we go... Clean and ready to bear the banner.
Don't act so shocked. You've seen worse.
There we are, good as new...
I do not require sleep. Rest, friends...
There are few moments in life where one needs to truly fear. Ask yourself - Is this one?
My liege's court jester once told me this fascinating story...
Here, friend, hold my hand. Things are not as uncertain this way, are they?
I've tended to many battlefield wounds. This is just another on the list.
Hold, friend. Let me sort these injuries.
Calm. The faster your heart beats, the more blood you lose.
N-No! NOOO!
Stay BACK! I DON'T WANT TO DIE AGAIN!
I-I've faced death already! Leave me alone!
*Long scream* They want my SOUL!
As with my liege, as with my queen, as with my home. You're all conspirators to my end.
I am a loose end you wish to tie, is it? Come on, then. FACE ME!
You are foolish to consider me blind to your attempts to undermine my life.
In my reflections, I can see your hateful endeavors.
You want me DEAD! I KNOW IT! FACE ME!
The Lash is all I need for these broken bones!
Cherish me, o' goddesses of pain! I COME FOR YOU!
More hits! MORE HITS! PLEEEAAASE!
I feel alive! Alive I say!
Comrades! Join me in a baptism of BLOOD! OUR BLOOD!
Ignorant bags of errant flesh, all of you.
I must improve my lustre! Surrender your whetstones!
I am a terrible, terrible thing... Don't look, I don't want you seeing what I've become.
M-My lady?! Is that you?! Have you returned to my arms?!
I've brushed with death enough times to know him on a first name basis. This is just another time I can slap his hand.
Kahaha! How cute.
Form ranks! Tonight, we dine in the tavern, or in HELL!
Behind me! I will lead us to GLORY!
Look at how it staggered, watch its footwork. We can use that.
I love this part of my occupation.
KREYAAAAAAAGH!
MY CRYSTALS SCREAM, MY VEINS ARE ON FIRE! SURRENDER YOUR SOULS, BEASTS OF THE DARK!
*His crystals begin regrowing rapidly..!*
Fah, I've been faced with worse.
That look in your eyes reassures me, friend.
My father would be proud of me.
THEY DO NOT QUIVER IN UNDULATION! THEY QUIVER IN FEAR!
To think that THIS was the cosmic threat they spoke of! Kahaha!
Observe its stagger.
Its legs are weak. Sweep them.
Take these crystals, they burn with my RAGE!
MY FURY IS OF A THOUSAND STARS! WE WILL DESTROY THEM ALL! WE WILL EAT THEIR SOULS!
My limbs obey me once more.
Fahaha... I can feel my wounds sealing. Time itself bleeds out in my stead.
G-Gah! Look at those TEETH!
No! No no no! NOOO!
(sob) Please..! Make it STOOOP!
You're conspiring to kill me now, I can SEE it!
Yes! MORE! PLEASE!
Look at you, bumbling about in the dark. Kahaha!
Gaze upon me! NOW! I DEMAND YOU HONOR MY GLORY!
We aren't going to make it, we're... done.
M-My queen! There you are! Come, quick, before the King returns..! Hahahaaah!
NIGHTSOIL! THIS IS ALL NIGHTSOIL! I-I WANT TO LIVE, DAMN YOU, LIVE!
Trap. Right there. I can see it. Don't think I'm an idiot.
More pain, more PAIN!
Ah, my love, my queen... Let me embrace you.
Where are you going, my queen, my muse? Come back..!
Just let me die already.
Just let me DIE!
Come on..! I want to DIE!
I am useless here, no one will benefit from my presence.
Out of my way, let me die.
Just... make it end already.
I must have my title known EVERYWHERE! PRAISE TO ME!
Let my lustre be known!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
YOU can handle this. I'M going to appreciate my crystals.
Fahaha! I'll say I killed this one, don't worry.
N-No! Please no!
I-I-I don't want to get close!
NOOOO!
Only an idiot would fall for these tricks. I'm sitting this out.
You do not control me.
I can see right through your musings to kill me.
Fah! Such idiocy is the path to a mundane existence.
Idiot.
I could have planned that better. Try again.
What use would it be..? We're all going to die.
Wh-What?! My PANTS?! Yes, my queen! I shall do away with my trousers at once! (He begins trying to yank off his belt).
No, THIS is a proper combat action. YOUR'S would get me murdered.
Please hit me please hit me please hit me...
Let me show you how a REAL knight swings his weight, idiots.
GLORY TO MEEE!
Please, just let me DIE already..! *sob* Please...
This way to the stockroom, my queen. We shall dance!
Th-The shadows..! They're alive, watching us... Sh-Shhh!!!
I'm not sleeping, I'll keep my eyes open for your idiot plans.
The fire feels so good on my hands, why can't I reach into the blazes again..?
You couldn't cook a meal if your lives depended on it.
The bags are MINE tonight! You lot get the dirt. I deserve this rest.
M-My queen, why have you entered my chambers..? What is that..? ...M-My queen..?
YES! MORE TO ME!
*sob* I just... I... *sob*
Not my chestplate, my lady..! W-What if he sees us..?
MMMH! That felt splendid...
I have to do it myself... *sob* ...I guess.
Avocado, my lady! Avocado! The word of safety is Avocado!
Turn our BACKS?! Are you MAD?!
Leave without me. I want to die here.
BATHE IN OUR PAIN, COWARDS!
M-My lady... Do not leave just yet. Please, cuddle with me a while longer?
G-Gaaah..! Help me, please! PLEASE!
How could it see through my movements?! WHO SET ME TO THIS?!
Come on, one of you take these blows for me! I grow tired of seeing my lustre tarnished!
A-Aaaaah..!~
I won't say it again, my queen. I promise..!
T-They're too fast..!
YOU CONSPIRE WITH THEM! I KNOW IT!
(Under his breath) "...now just swing back..."
M-My love... What's wrong..? Does he know?
DO NOT TAKE MY GLORY!
Fah! You call that a cleave? You must be dreaming.
M-My lord, she is just a lady! She has done no wrong!
They shift! THEY SHIFT! What errant flesh are they?! What eldritch deity commands them?!
Oh,c come ON! You expect me to believe that was accidental?
Swing harder, that'll SURELY make your lazy eye correct itself. Idiot.
Are you so sure that you're cut out for this? Maybe a great knight such as I could take your place for this glorious task?
Restrain yourself my lord! What woes have invoked her to be so bloodied like this..?!
It's not enough! P-Please, let's just..! RUN!
Method acting at its finest.
NOOO!!! NOT THEM, PLEASE!
Fahaha! That's what you get.
M-My lady... Hush, he can't hurt you anymore.
I-It's over for us!
Oh come, are you supposed to tell me that was an accident?!
Yes my lord..! Leave her be..! Hit ME instead..!
N-No! No, please stay..! Don't... Don't run!
You would flank me? HAH! Idiot.
Leave me to rot? YES! PLEASE!
No you don't, GET BACK HERE!
My love... P-Please don't go...
It's POISON! Poison I say!
I need to suffer! BLEED, BURN AND BOIL!
No... I-I... *sob* I need to die.
My lady... I-I cannot accept this. It is his ring...
You think I'd just LET you touch me?! You must be fooling yourself. Traitor.
I'm enjoying this. Heal someone else.
I need to repent, pay for my sins. *sniffle*
I can almost hear her voice! She's singing! AHAHAHA!
No. I'm not going to let you 'empower' me. How do I know you won't stab me when I turn?
I'm enjoying this. Embolden someone else.
It won't help any... It... *sigh* Just let me die already.
N-Not at the table, my lady... Shhh..!
A-Aah! Keep it away..! You scared me.
A-Aah! keep it away..! You scared me.
Wh-What?! What is that?!
No.
Keep your mitts off me, I trusted one person in my life, and she betrayed my love.
Keep your disgusting hands away from me.
I need to revel in this pain.
My recompense is nigh! Let me enjoy this!
Make yourself useful and pass the salt. My few pieces of flesh bleed.
HAH! Try again next night, moron.
Idiot.
Moron.
Glory is not wrought from being babied by some idiot.
How about you polish my crystals instead?
Shine my mail instead.
Death's already knocking for me.
Don't come close to me... I'm... *sob*... a monster.
Drive your blade into me instead...
M-My lady..! Do not reach below my belt, we're in public..!
M-My love... Why are you so angry with me..?
Please, my lady, just talk to me. No trists, no flings. Just words.
*He remains entirely quiet*
*Not a peep leaves his armor*
*He just breathes, heavily*
Pain... Pain... PAIN PAIN PAIN PAIN!
Let me BLEED damn you!
If you mend me, I'll just open the wound again.
You must sniff the hides of pigs to think that'd work.
You boot licking scum, hands off.
I'm not going near. You smell of nightsoil.
My lady..? Are you okay?
Rejecting your advances was the only way, my love.
Poison. I see it. I was poisoned once before.
I can clearly see the poison within the food.
Hunger is life, life is hunger... *He repeats it over and over.*
I will starve. Let me starve.
Take my portions.
Just... let me mourn.
My lord, I can see the specks. You've poisoned my food. ...So you know. Now you know what I must do.
Put that down!
You moron! LEARN!
LEAVE HER ALONE, YOU DESPOTIC ABUSER OF WIVES! AWAY WITH YOU!
...I was wrong to indulge her lust, but... I couldn't resist...
I can see her before me, my trists... My love. Bloodied, beaten. The king bearing her crown, dented... Leave her alone..!
The allure of her perfume, it returns to my nose...
My love. I'm coming home.
Don't let my loss undermine our efforts..! Press on without me..!
Hollow Knight

The Hollow Knight is an oddity, a beast without rage. A warrior without recompense, or proper burial. He fights best in the front line, where he is needed most. Charge allows him to return to the frontline if he is sent back, and his Fear Eater can reduce stress from his allies, if only to bear it himself. Even in death, he will serve to the last breath.

The Hollow Knight doesn't need to worry about repairing his armor in vital spots, given his crystalline makeup. Instead, he focuses on forging his plate as heavily as he can bear it, as to halt the advances of his foes.

The Hollow Knight is a fickle sort at camp. Few skills benefit anyone, and he tends to mimic the others with basic skills. His talents are best spent in the heat of combat, where he finds himself yearning to.
Dead Again

NOOOO!

NOOO!!! NOT THEM, PLEASE!

Leave me to rot? YES! PLEASE!
No you don't, GET BACK HERE!
My love... P-Please don't go...

I need to suffer! BLEED, BURN AND BOIL!

My lady... I-I cannot accept this. It is his ring...

I need to repent, pay for my sins. *sniffle*
I can almost hear her voice! She's singing! AHAHAHA!

Keep your disgusting hands away from me.

Moron.

*Not a peep leaves his armor*
*He just breathes, heavily*
Pain... Pain... PAIN PAIN PAIN PAIN!
Let me BLEED damn you!

You boot licking scum, hands off.

I can clearly see the poison within the food.

Take my portions.
Just... let me mourn.

Put that down!
You moron! LEARN!
LEAVE HER ALONE, YOU DESPOTIC ABUSER OF WIVES! AWAY WITH YOU!
...I was wrong to indulge her lust, but... I couldn't resist...

The allure of her perfume, it returns to my nose...
My love. I'm coming home.
Don't let my loss undermine our efforts..! Press on without me..!

Полый Рыцарь настоящая диковинка - монстр, чудище не способное к животной ярости. Воин ушедший без почестей и достойных ему похорон. Лучше всего он сражается в первых рядах, там, где он нужен больше всего. Прорыв помогает ему вернуться на переднюю линию в случае коллапса строя, а Поедание Страха снимает стресс с союзников, лишь что бы самому нести это бремя. Даже в смерти он будет служить до последнего вздоха.

Полому Рыцарю не нужно заботиться о починке его брони в уязвимых местах, а всё благодаря его кристаллическому строению. Вместо этого он усиливает грудную пластину настолько, насколько может, что бы сводить все попытки продвижения противника на нет.

На привале полезность Полого Рыцаря довольно переменчива. Всего пара его навыков могут помочь кому-то, а в остальном он лишь пытается подражать знаниям других. Его таланты по настоящему показывают себя в пылу битв, по которым он тоскует на привале.
Умерший Вновь
Покуда душа в теле держится

Странствующий рыцарь нашёл свою смерть на Ферме близ Гамлета, но восстал среди трупов, движимых безумным светом Кометы. Его плоть обратилась в кристаллы, его тело переродилось и теперь он готов закончить то, зачем сюда пришёл.
Ещё больше рыцарей пали смертью храбрых перед Кометой. Они, несомненно, восстанут, но с ними и перебежчики, что готовы помочь нашим бедам.
Так-то лучше... Я чист и готов нести знамя.
Нечему так удивляться. Вы и по хуже видали.
Ну вот, теперь как новенький...
Я не нуждаюсь во сне. Спите, друзья...

Шут при дворе моего Милорда рассказал мне увлекательнейшую историю...
Вот, друг, возьми меня за руку. Не так уж и непредсказуемо обстоят дела, правда?

Держись, друг. Давай я обработаю твои раны.
Спокойствие. Чем быстрее бьётся сердце, тем больше крови ты теряешь.
Н-нет! НЕЕЕЕЕЕТ!
Пошёл ПРОЧЬ! Я ХОЧУ УМИРАТЬ ВНОВЬ!
Я у-уже встречался со смертью! Оставь меня в покое!
*Протяжный крик* Они жаждут мою ДУШУ!

Кнут - всё что нужно для этих поломанных костей!

М-Миледи?! Это Вы?! Вы вернулись в мои объятия?!

Ч-Что?! Мои ШТАНЫ?! Да, моя королева! Портки это вовсе не помеха! *пытается расстегнуть ремень*

Прошу попади по мне прошу попади по мне прошу попади по мне...

НЕ СМЕЙ ОТБИРАТЬ МОЮ СЛАВУ!

Они меняются! ОНИ ИЗМЕНЯЮТСЯ! Из какой бесовщины они сотворены?! Что за нечестивые черти ими командуют?!
Да ладно, СЕРЬЁЗНО? Хочешь сказать что это была случайность?
Бей сильнее, ведь это ТОЧНО вылечит твоё косоглазие. Идиот.

А-Ааа! Убери это от меня..! Ты напугал меня.

Нет.
Держи ручонки при себе. Я доверял лишь одной персоне, и та предала мою любовь.
Убери от меня свои грязные ручонки.
Я должен упиваться этой болью.
Моя награда уже близка! Дай мне насладиться ею сполна!
Докажи свою полезность и подай лучше соль. Плоть что осталась на мне снова кровоточит.
ХАХ! Попробуй снова следующей ночью, кретин.
Идиот.
Кретин.
Я не смогу прославиться если со мной будут нянчиться какие-то недомерки.
А может лучше вместо этого отполируешь мой кристал?
Лучше бы броню мне отполировал.
Я уже чувствую дыхание смерти.
Не подходи ко мне... Я... *всхлип*... я чудовище.
Вместо этого вонзи в меня что поострее...
М-Миледи..! Не надо тянуться к моему ремню, мы же на людях..!
М-Моя любовь... Почему ты так зла на меня..?
Миледи, прошу, просто поговорите со мной. Без утех, без ласк. Только слова.
*В ответ он ничего не говорит*
*Ни один писк не доноситься из его брони*
*Он лишь грузно дышит*
Боль... Боль... БОЛЬ БОЛЬ БОЛЬ БОЛЬ!
Дай же мне пролить КРОВЬ, чёрт бы тебя побрал!
Если ты залатаешь меня, я просто вскрою рану снова.
Да ты, должно быть, белены объелся, раз считаешь что это сработает.
Руки прочь, ты, беспризорное отребье.
Я и не вздумаю подойти. От тебя навозом разит.
Миледи..? Вы в порядке?
Отвергать твои ухаживания было единственным путём, моя любовь.
Яд. Я вижу его. Меня уже отравили однажды.
Я отчётливо вижу яд в моей еде.
Голод это жизнь, жизнь это голод... *Он повторяет это снова и снова*
Я буду голодать. Оставьте меня голодать.
Возьми мою порцию.
Просто... оставь меня с моей печалью.
Милорд, я вижу крупицы мышьяка в моей еде. ...Значит Вы всё узнали. Вы знаете что Я должен сделать.
Положи это на место!
Ты кретин! УЧИСЬ!
ОСТАВЬ ЕЁ В ПОКОЕ, ТЫ, ДЕСПОТИЧНЫЙ НАСИЛЬНИК ЖЁН! УБИРАЙСЯ ПРОЧЬ!
...Мне не стоило предаваться её страсти... Но я не смог устоять...
Я вижу её перед собой, моя отрада... Моя любовь. Кровавая, избитая. Король держит её мятую корону... Оставь её в покое..!
Аромат её парфюма так приятно щекочет мой нос...
Моя любовь. Я возвращаюсь домой.
Не дайте моей жертве быть напрасной..! Сражайтесь без меня..!

Hollow Knight

Fear Eater

The Hollow Knight is an oddity, a beast without rage. A warrior without recompense, or proper burial. He fights best in the front line, where he is needed most. Charge allows him to return to the frontline if he is sent back, and his Fear Eater can reduce stress from his allies, if only to bear it himself. Even in death, he will serve to the last breath.

The Hollow Knight doesn't need to worry about repairing his armor in vital spots, given his crystalline makeup. Instead, he focuses on forging his plate as heavily as he can bear it, as to halt the advances of his foes.

The Hollow Knight is a fickle sort at camp. Few skills benefit anyone, and he tends to mimic the others with basic skills. His talents are best spent in the heat of combat, where he finds himself yearning to.
Dead Again
More Bodies To Tend To

A wayfaring knight passed on in the Farmstead, but rose among the corpses of those within the Comet's hateful light. His flesh turned crystalline, and his body reborn, he stands ready to complete the task he was sent for.
More knights fall victim to the Comet. More rise, and with them, more defectors to aide our cause.
There we go... Clean and ready to bear the banner.
Don't act so shocked. You've seen worse.
There we are, good as new...
I do not require sleep. Rest, friends...
There are few moments in life where one needs to truly fear. Ask yourself - Is this one?
My liege's court jester once told me this fascinating story...
Here, friend, hold my hand. Things are not as uncertain this way, are they?
I've tended to many battlefield wounds. This is just another on the list.
Hold, friend. Let me sort these injuries.
Calm. The faster your heart beats, the more blood you lose.
N-No! NOOO!
Stay BACK! I DON'T WANT TO DIE AGAIN!
I-I've faced death already! Leave me alone!
*Long scream* They want my SOUL!
As with my liege, as with my queen, as with my home. You're all conspirators to my end.
I am a loose end you wish to tie, is it? Come on, then. FACE ME!
You are foolish to consider me blind to your attempts to undermine my life.
In my reflections, I can see your hateful endeavors.
You want me DEAD! I KNOW IT! FACE ME!
The Lash is all I need for these broken bones!
Cherish me, o' goddesses of pain! I COME FOR YOU!
More hits! MORE HITS! PLEEEAAASE!
I feel alive! Alive I say!
Comrades! Join me in a baptism of BLOOD! OUR BLOOD!
Ignorant bags of errant flesh, all of you.
I must improve my lustre! Surrender your whetstones!
I am a terrible, terrible thing... Don't look, I don't want you seeing what I've become.
M-My lady?! Is that you?! Have you returned to my arms?!
I've brushed with death enough times to know him on a first name basis. This is just another time I can slap his hand.
Kahaha! How cute.
Form ranks! Tonight, we dine in the tavern, or in HELL!
Behind me! I will lead us to GLORY!
Look at how it staggered, watch its footwork. We can use that.
I love this part of my occupation.
KREYAAAAAAAGH!
MY CRYSTALS SCREAM, MY VEINS ARE ON FIRE! SURRENDER YOUR SOULS, BEASTS OF THE DARK!
*His crystals begin regrowing rapidly..!*
Fah, I've been faced with worse.
That look in your eyes reassures me, friend.
My father would be proud of me.
THEY DO NOT QUIVER IN UNDULATION! THEY QUIVER IN FEAR!
To think that THIS was the cosmic threat they spoke of! Kahaha!
Observe its stagger.
Its legs are weak. Sweep them.
Take these crystals, they burn with my RAGE!
MY FURY IS OF A THOUSAND STARS! WE WILL DESTROY THEM ALL! WE WILL EAT THEIR SOULS!
My limbs obey me once more.
Fahaha... I can feel my wounds sealing. Time itself bleeds out in my stead.
G-Gah! Look at those TEETH!
No! No no no! NOOO!
(sob) Please..! Make it STOOOP!
You're conspiring to kill me now, I can SEE it!
Yes! MORE! PLEASE!
Look at you, bumbling about in the dark. Kahaha!
Gaze upon me! NOW! I DEMAND YOU HONOR MY GLORY!
We aren't going to make it, we're... done.
M-My queen! There you are! Come, quick, before the King returns..! Hahahaaah!
NIGHTSOIL! THIS IS ALL NIGHTSOIL! I-I WANT TO LIVE, DAMN YOU, LIVE!
Trap. Right there. I can see it. Don't think I'm an idiot.
More pain, more PAIN!
Ah, my love, my queen... Let me embrace you.
Where are you going, my queen, my muse? Come back..!
Just let me die already.
Just let me DIE!
Come on..! I want to DIE!
I am useless here, no one will benefit from my presence.
Out of my way, let me die.
Just... make it end already.
I must have my title known EVERYWHERE! PRAISE TO ME!
Let my lustre be known!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
Kiss the ground I walk on, knaves!
YOU can handle this. I'M going to appreciate my crystals.
Fahaha! I'll say I killed this one, don't worry.
N-No! Please no!
I-I-I don't want to get close!
NOOOO!
Only an idiot would fall for these tricks. I'm sitting this out.
You do not control me.
I can see right through your musings to kill me.
Fah! Such idiocy is the path to a mundane existence.
Idiot.
I could have planned that better. Try again.
What use would it be..? We're all going to die.
Wh-What?! My PANTS?! Yes, my queen! I shall do away with my trousers at once! (He begins trying to yank off his belt).
No, THIS is a proper combat action. YOUR'S would get me murdered.
Please hit me please hit me please hit me...
Let me show you how a REAL knight swings his weight, idiots.
GLORY TO MEEE!
Please, just let me DIE already..! *sob* Please...
This way to the stockroom, my queen. We shall dance!
Th-The shadows..! They're alive, watching us... Sh-Shhh!!!
I'm not sleeping, I'll keep my eyes open for your idiot plans.
The fire feels so good on my hands, why can't I reach into the blazes again..?
You couldn't cook a meal if your lives depended on it.
The bags are MINE tonight! You lot get the dirt. I deserve this rest.
M-My queen, why have you entered my chambers..? What is that..? ...M-My queen..?
YES! MORE TO ME!
*sob* I just... I... *sob*
Not my chestplate, my lady..! W-What if he sees us..?
MMMH! That felt splendid...
I have to do it myself... *sob* ...I guess.
Avocado, my lady! Avocado! The word of safety is Avocado!
Turn our BACKS?! Are you MAD?!
Leave without me. I want to die here.
BATHE IN OUR PAIN, COWARDS!
M-My lady... Do not leave just yet. Please, cuddle with me a while longer?
G-Gaaah..! Help me, please! PLEASE!
How could it see through my movements?! WHO SET ME TO THIS?!
Come on, one of you take these blows for me! I grow tired of seeing my lustre tarnished!
A-Aaaaah..!~
I won't say it again, my queen. I promise..!
T-They're too fast..!
YOU CONSPIRE WITH THEM! I KNOW IT!
(Under his breath) "...now just swing back..."
M-My love... What's wrong..? Does he know?
DO NOT TAKE MY GLORY!
Fah! You call that a cleave? You must be dreaming.
M-My lord, she is just a lady! She has done no wrong!
They shift! THEY SHIFT! What errant flesh are they?! What eldritch deity commands them?!
Oh,c come ON! You expect me to believe that was accidental?
Swing harder, that'll SURELY make your lazy eye correct itself. Idiot.
Are you so sure that you're cut out for this? Maybe a great knight such as I could take your place for this glorious task?
Restrain yourself my lord! What woes have invoked her to be so bloodied like this..?!
It's not enough! P-Please, let's just..! RUN!
Method acting at its finest.
NOOO!!! NOT THEM, PLEASE!
Fahaha! That's what you get.
M-My lady... Hush, he can't hurt you anymore.
I-It's over for us!
Oh come, are you supposed to tell me that was an accident?!
Yes my lord..! Leave her be..! Hit ME instead..!
N-No! No, please stay..! Don't... Don't run!
You would flank me? HAH! Idiot.
Leave me to rot? YES! PLEASE!
No you don't, GET BACK HERE!
My love... P-Please don't go...
It's POISON! Poison I say!
I need to suffer! BLEED, BURN AND BOIL!
No... I-I... *sob* I need to die.
My lady... I-I cannot accept this. It is his ring...
You think I'd just LET you touch me?! You must be fooling yourself. Traitor.
I'm enjoying this. Heal someone else.
I need to repent, pay for my sins. *sniffle*
I can almost hear her voice! She's singing! AHAHAHA!
No. I'm not going to let you 'empower' me. How do I know you won't stab me when I turn?
I'm enjoying this. Embolden someone else.
It won't help any... It... *sigh* Just let me die already.
N-Not at the table, my lady... Shhh..!
A-Aah! Keep it away..! You scared me.
A-Aah! keep it away..! You scared me.
Wh-What?! What is that?!
No.
Keep your mitts off me, I trusted one person in my life, and she betrayed my love.
Keep your disgusting hands away from me.
I need to revel in this pain.
My recompense is nigh! Let me enjoy this!
Make yourself useful and pass the salt. My few pieces of flesh bleed.
HAH! Try again next night, moron.
Idiot.
Moron.
Glory is not wrought from being babied by some idiot.
How about you polish my crystals instead?
Shine my mail instead.
Death's already knocking for me.
Don't come close to me... I'm... *sob*... a monster.
Drive your blade into me instead...
M-My lady..! Do not reach below my belt, we're in public..!
M-My love... Why are you so angry with me..?
Please, my lady, just talk to me. No trists, no flings. Just words.
*He remains entirely quiet*
*Not a peep leaves his armor*
*He just breathes, heavily*
Pain... Pain... PAIN PAIN PAIN PAIN!
Let me BLEED damn you!
If you mend me, I'll just open the wound again.
You must sniff the hides of pigs to think that'd work.
You boot licking scum, hands off.
I'm not going near. You smell of nightsoil.
My lady..? Are you okay?
Rejecting your advances was the only way, my love.
Poison. I see it. I was poisoned once before.
I can clearly see the poison within the food.
Hunger is life, life is hunger... *He repeats it over and over.*
I will starve. Let me starve.
Take my portions.
Just... let me mourn.
My lord, I can see the specks. You've poisoned my food. ...So you know. Now you know what I must do.
Put that down!
You moron! LEARN!
LEAVE HER ALONE, YOU DESPOTIC ABUSER OF WIVES! AWAY WITH YOU!
...I was wrong to indulge her lust, but... I couldn't resist...
I can see her before me, my trists... My love. Bloodied, beaten. The king bearing her crown, dented... Leave her alone..!
The allure of her perfume, it returns to my nose...
My love. I'm coming home.
Don't let my loss undermine our efforts..! Press on without me..!
